====== DFID Aid Information Platform ======
/* Please provide a brief description of the tool, and upload a screenshot if possible. Include details of the tool creator. */

The UK Department for International Development are creating an 'Aid Information Platform' that will display information on all the aid funded projects from UK Government Departments, drawing upon IATI data as the source. 

===== Detailed Description =====
/* Provide additional details here */

The platform is build in Scala at the front-end, and uses the Neo4J graph store for data management. It provides API access onto the data.

It implements feature for aid traceability, allowing the relationships between IATI data to be explored. 

As of May 2013 the platform is in private beta.
